GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of information about a specific article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the specified article's number of votes by a given amount and serves the updated article object

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment to the database and serves an the new comment object

DELETE /api/comment/comment_id.description: Deletes a comment from the database by comment ID
